title: Pi Day!
article: On March 13, Senesh will have a Pie Day Competition! Led by Mikayla, the 7-8th grade math teacher, and Amy, the 5-6th grade math teacher, we will have an exciting day! How much pi do you know? How good are you at memorizing? Competitions will be held in class to compete for a to-be-determined prize! The finals will take place during lunch and the winner will receive another prize. Talk to Tracey if you are interested in being in the lunch competition! Memorize, and have fun!
author: Adam Bellows
